answers.answer: The revolutionary drug Telaprevir (Google it!!!!!) will be availble late 2010.It is specifically for Genotype 1.The question of natural treatment is very contentious.No one claims it is a treatment although some do feel better with supplements.The options for supplements are so numerous I can't even begin to discuss them.Many people have their favourites.Anyway knowing that a whole proven new treatment regime will soon be availible should buck you up!

question: I contracted Hepatitis C, genotype 1a from two units of contaminated blood following surgery for rhabdomyosarcoma (cancer of the muscle; entire quadricep muscle system removed). I faithfully followed a 48-week treatment program of interferon/ribaviran but did not receive a clearing. My last HCVRNA count was on 4/19/07 and was 2,500,000 and I  find there in no further treatment available for me at this time.My questions: Do you recommend any natural treatment possibilities?  I have incredible fatigue and a severe case of neuropathy. ( I am a full-time professor and must continue to work. My white blood cell count is 2.2, I weigh 139 lbs. at 5.7" and am conscientious about diet and exercise. I have been test for sugar diabetes and am clear in that area.)Thank you
title: Hepatitis C Next Step
